about_the_game:
Game Objective:

- You will survive until a specific time in each level, and after battling the final boss, you will proceed to the next levels.

- Monsters spawn around the character, and you will acquire weapons to make your character stronger than them.

- The game features weapons, turrets, and characters that will help you easily defeat monsters. However, since each weapon has unique characteristics and monsters have different weaknesses, you must plan accordingly.

Inferno Sentinel Future Plans or Current Status of Our Game:

Since I am developing the game on my own, it takes a long time to bring updates to the game, and I apologize for this situation. As I am studying at university and also preparing for exams, I cannot work extensively on adding new features to the game. Once I graduate from university, I will make up for these shortcomings. I will add many more features. The ones listed below are just a few of them.

1-) The game will have a story (In this part, the codes are almost non-existent, but since there will be animations, images, and cinematic areas, I am not experienced).

2-) Infinite levels and many more stages.

3-) Dozens of weapons, turrets, and characters will be added, each with unique features and abilities.

4-) Weapon and turret selling feature or in-game purchases will be added.

5-) Much more (I come up with new features every day).
